main event: A bright light was observed appearing to turn and approached at a high rate of speed in Banning, California.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 12 minutes., The object appeared to move similarly to aircraft landing lights., The light approached slowly from the southwest to the northeast., The object was at an altitude of 4 feet with a climbing angle., Military involvement was noted but no aircraft were known to be flying at the time.
witness description: military aircraft dispatcher with good reliability
